info.title: ProPublica Campaign Finance
info.description: The Campaign Finance API includes information about electronic filings, which are submitted to the Federal Election Commission on nearly every day of the year. The API, which originated at The New York Times in 2008, provides details about specific types of filings, filings for a specific date and a summary of financial information in each filing.

get.description: Retrieves candidates by first or last name.
Retrieves a specific candidate.

get.summary: Get top 20 candidates in specific financial category
get.description: Retrieves the top 20 candidates within a given financial category for a given campaign cycle.
Retrieves an array of FEC candidates for a given state (and optional chamber and district).
Retrieves the 20 most recently added candidates.

During the last 20 days before a primary or general election, candidate committees must file reports of any contributions of $1,000 or more within 48 hours of receipt. This retrieves the most recent late contributions to candidates.

get.summary: Get recent late contributions to a candidate
get.description: Retrieves the most recent late contributions to a specific candidate.

get.summary: Get recent late contributions to a committee
get.description: Retrieves the most recent late contributions to a specific committee.

get.summary: Get recent late contributions by date
get.description: Retrieves late contributions from a specific date.
Retrieves a list of committees.

total_independent_expenditures.description: The total number of independent expenditures.
total_independent_expenditures.title: Total Independent Expenditures

total_candidate_contributions.description: The total number of candidate contributions.
total_candidate_contributions.title: Total Candidate Contributions

get.description: Retrieves a specific FEC committee for a given campaign cycle.
Retrieves the 20 most recently added FEC committees.

get.summary: Get recently added independent expenditure-only committees
get.description: Retrieves the 20 most recently added FEC independent expenditure-only committees, known as super PACs.

cash_on_hand.description: The amount of cash on hand.
cash_on_hand.title: Cash On Hand

get.description: Retrieves the 20 most recent FEC filings from the specified committee.
Retrieves committees designated as leadership PACs by the FEC.

cash_on_hand.description: The amount of cash on hand.

get.description: Retrieves information about FEC reports filed electronically by a committee.

cash_on_hand.description: The amount of cash on hand.

get.description: Retrieves information about FEC reports filed electronically on a specific date.
Retrieves a list of available form types for FEC electronic filings.

cash_on_hand.description: The amount of cash on hand.
cash_on_hand.title: Cash On Hand

get.description: Retrieves the most recent electronic filings by form type.

get.summary: Get summary for a specific presidential electronic filing
get.description: Retrieves summary figures from a specific FEC electronic filing (Form 3 filings by presidential candidates only).
Retrieves the 200 most recent independent expenditures and optionally can be offset by multiples of 20.
Retrieves all independent expenditures on a specific date (the date of activity, not the date filed with the FEC).

get.summary: Get independent expenditures by specific committee
get.description: Retrieves the 20 most recent independent expenditures by a given committee.

get.summary: Get independent expenditures that support or oppose a specific candidate
get.description: Retrieves the 200 most recent independent expenditures in support of or opposition to a given candidate.

get.summary: Get independent expenditures that support or oppose presidential candidates
get.description: Retrieves the 200 most recent independent expenditures in support of or opposition to any presidential candidate.
Retrieves the amount of money spent in independent expenditures for a given office (either House, Senate or President).

get.summary: Get independent expenditures race totals for a specific committee
get.description: Retrieves the total amounts of money that a given committee has spent on individual races (consisting of a state, office and district) during a cycle.

back_reference_tran_id_number.description: The back reference transaction ID number.
back_reference_tran_id_number.title: Back Reference Transaction ID Number

back_reference_tran_id_number.description: The back reference transaction unique identifier.
back_reference_tran_id_number.title: Back Reference Transaction ID Number

get.description: Retrieves the 20 most recent broadcast advertisements that identify one or more federal candidates (and have aired 30 days before a primary election and 60 days before the general election).

back_reference_tran_id_number.description: The back reference transaction ID number.

back_reference_tran_id_number.title: Back Reference Transaction ID Number

get.summary: Get electioneering communications by specific committee
get.description: Retrieves the most recent broadcast advertisements by a specific committee that identify one or more federal candidates (and have aired 30 days before a primary election and 60 days before the general election).

back_reference_tran_id_number.description: The back reference transaction ID number.
back_reference_tran_id_number.title: Back Reference Transaction ID Number

back_reference_tran_id_number.title: Back Reference Transaction ID Number

get.description: Retrieves all broadcast advertisements that identify one or more federal candidates (and have aired 30 days before a primary election and 60 days before the general election) from a specific date.

get.summary: Get lobbyist bundlers for a specific committee
get.description: Retrieves the most recent lobbyist bundlers reported by a specific committee.
